column1: this; describes a noun physically or temporally near the speaker
that; describes a noun physically or temporally near the listener
that over there; describes a noun near neither the speaker nor listener
the; definite qualifier; describes a subset recently mentioned
some; describes a subset not specified or afformentioned
any; one of; describes a single arbitrary instance
each; every; describes every instance individually
all; describes the set of all instances
not; anything but; describes the complement
